code: class  Solution  {   public :   int  binarySearchableNumbers ( vector < int >&  nums )  {   const  int  n  =  nums . size ();   int  ans  =  0 ;     vector < int >  prefixMaxs ( n );     vector < int >  suffixMins ( n );     prefixMaxs [ 0 ]  =  INT_MIN ;   for  ( int  i  =  1 ;  i  <  n ;  ++ i )   prefixMaxs [ i ]  =  max ( prefixMaxs [ i  -  1 ],  nums [ i  -  1 ]);     suffixMins [ n  -  1 ]  =  INT_MAX ;   for  ( int  i  =  n  -  2 ;  i  >=  0 ;  -- i )   suffixMins [ i ]  =  min ( suffixMins [ i  +  1 ],  nums [ i  +  1 ]);   for  ( int  i  =  0 ;  i  <  n ;  ++ i )   if  ( prefixMaxs [ i ]  <  nums [ i ]  &&  nums [ i ]  <  suffixMins [ i ])   ++ ans ;   return  ans ;   }  };
